title: TikTok's potential U.S. ban presents host of questions for app stores, internet companies and the government
description: If TikTok is banned in the U.S., connecting to the app likely won't be as easy as using a virtual private network.

title: Fed poised to approve quarter-point rate hike next week, despite market turmoil
description: Chairman Jerome Powell and his fellow central bankers will want to signal that it's important to continue the fight to bring down inflation.

title: Here are the most polluted cities and countries in the world
description: The report found that the top five most polluted countries in 2022 were Chad, Iraq, Pakistan, Bahrain and Bangladesh.

title: First Republic shares fall more than 20% despite deposit infusion, dragging down other regional banks
description: The losses come even after 11 other banks pledged to deposit $30 billion in First Republic as a vote of confidence in the company.

title: President Erdogan says Turkey will start ratifying Finland's NATO application
description: Turkey's President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Friday approved Finland's accession to NATO after months of talks.

title: Macron enrages France by forcing through pension bill with no vote. But few think he'll be forced out
description: The French government faces a no confidence vote that it is expected to survive.

title: UK backs Rolls-Royce project to build a nuclear reactor on the moon
description: Rolls-Royce is set to work with a range of organizations on the project.

title: Credit Suisse sheds another 5% as traders digest emergency liquidity
description: Credit Suisse shares opened down 5% Friday after soaring over the previous session.

title: China's Xi to go to Russia next week for his first visit since Putin ordered invasion of Ukraine
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping is set to visit Russia from March 20 to 22, China's Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced Friday.

title: From spying to Swiss bailout: How years of turbulence at Credit Suisse came to a head
description: Credit Suisse's path to the brink has been a long and tumultuous one.

title: Baidu says it can now operate robotaxis in Beijing with no human staff inside
description: The government approval initially covers 10 vehicles in the Beijing suburb of Yizhuang, which is home to many corporations such as JD.com.

title: You’ve heard about the 4-day workweek — but what about the 9-day fortnight?
description: Many businesses still face obstacles when considering a move to the four-day work week. Other working patterns like the nine-day fortnight could be a middle ground.

title: CNBC Daily Open: After First Republic rescue, fears of contagion are dispelled (again)
description: First Republic Bank will receive billions in deposits from 11 other banks. Credit Suisse will borrow billions from the Swiss National Bank. Crisis averted?

title: Fitch says banks in Asia are resilient to risks seen in U.S. bank failures
description: Asia-Pacific banks are "resilient to risks" highlighted by failures seen in U.S. banking sector, Fitch Ratings said Thursday.

title: China revives ruling party control of financial oversight
description: The ruling Communist Party of China is establishing commissions to oversee finance and tech, state media announced Thursday.
